person.persName: John H. Yerby (Wealthy Phillips County, AR farmer and First Lieutenant, First AR Cavalry)

body.p: Residence: Searcy Township, Old Town post office, Phillips County, Arkansas. A wealthy, Arkansas-born farmer. During the Civil War, First Lieutenant in First Arkansas Cavalry. Aide-de-camp to Colonel Archibald Dobbins. Captured as prisoner of war by Union Brigadier General N.B. Buford.
